00021 DynamicObject::DynamicObject(GameManager* gameManager, tbe::Matrix4f matrix) : Object(gameManager)
00022 {
00023     m_matrix = matrix;
00024     m_name = "DynamicObject";

00031 DYJumper::DYJumper(GameManager* gameManager, tbe::Matrix4f matrix) : DynamicObject(gameManager, matrix)
00032 {
00033     Open(OBJ_JUMPER);
00034 
00035     m_physicBody->BuildConvexNode(m_hardwareBuffer.GetAllVertex(), 0);
00036 
00037     m_particles = new BurningEmitter(gameManager->parallelscene.particles);
00038 
00039     m_particles->SetPos(m_aabb.min * 0.75f);
00040     m_particles->SetBoxSize(m_aabb.max * 1.25f);
00041     m_particles->SetTexture(PARTICLE_JUMPER);
00042     m_particles->SetFreeMove(0);
00043 
00044     m_particles->SetGravity(m_worldSettings.jumperGravity);
00045     m_particles->SetLifeInit(m_worldSettings.jumperLifeInit);
00046     m_particles->SetLifeDown(m_worldSettings.jumperLifeDown);
00047     m_particles->SetNumber(m_worldSettings.jumperNumber);
00048 
00049     m_particles->SetContinousMode(true);
00050 
00051     m_particles->Build();
00052 
00053     m_particles->SetParent(this);
00054 }
00055 
00056 DYJumper::~DYJumper()
00057 {
00058 }
00059 
00060 Object* DYJumper::CloneToObject()
00061 {
00062     DYJumper* dj = new DYJumper(m_gameManager, m_matrix);
00063     m_gameManager->RegisterDynamic(dj);
00064     return dj;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void DYJumper::OutputConstruction(std::iostream& stream)
00068 {
00069     using namespace std;
00070 
00071     stream << "+node" << endl;
00072     stream << "type=DYNAMIC" << endl;
00073     stream << "matrix=" << m_matrix << endl;
00074     stream << "action=JUMPER" << endl;
00075     stream << endl;
00076 }
00077 
00078 void DYJumper::InteractWith(Player* player)
00079 {
00080     Vector3f velocity = player->GetPhysicBody()->GetVelocity();
00081 
00082     velocity.y = 0;
00083 
00084     player->GetPhysicBody()->SetVelocity(velocity);
00085 
00086     NewtonBodyAddImpulse(player->GetPhysicBody()->GetBody(),
00087                          Vector3f(0, 32, 0), player->GetPos());
00088 
00089     m_soundManager->Play("jumper", player);
00090 }
00091 
00092 DYTeleporter::DYTeleporter(GameManager* gameManager, tbe::Matrix4f matrix) : DynamicObject(gameManager, matrix)
00093 {
00094     Open(OBJ_TELEPORTER);
00095 
00096     m_physicBody->BuildConvexNode(m_hardwareBuffer.GetAllVertex(), 0);
00097 
00098     m_particles = new BurningEmitter(gameManager->parallelscene.particles);
00099     m_particles->SetPos(m_aabb.min * 0.75f);
00100     m_particles->SetBoxSize(m_aabb.max * 1.25f);
00101     m_particles->SetTexture(PARTICLE_TELEPORTER);
00102     m_particles->SetFreeMove(0);
00103 
00104     m_particles->SetLifeInit(m_worldSettings.teleporterLifeInit);
00105     m_particles->SetLifeDown(m_worldSettings.teleporterLifeDown);
00106     m_particles->SetNumber(m_worldSettings.teleporterNumber);
00107     m_particles->SetGravity(m_worldSettings.teleporterGravity);
00108 
00109     m_particles->SetContinousMode(true);
00110 
00111     m_particles->Build();
00112 
00113     m_particles->SetParent(this);
00114 }

00118 }

00120 Object* DYTeleporter::CloneToObject()
00121 {
00122     DYTeleporter* dt = new DYTeleporter(m_gameManager, m_matrix);
00123     m_gameManager->RegisterDynamic(dt);
00124     return dt;
00125 }

00138 void DYTeleporter::InteractWith(Player* player)
00139 {
00140     player->SetRandomSpawnPos();
00141     m_soundManager->Play("teleport", player);
00142 }
